attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: the second i downloaded the app i immediately passes out from the thought of trumps face. my sister also started projectile vomiting when i told her i got it 🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Disgrace.
attributes.review: Trump has shown to be a complete disgrace of a president who did nothing to help with the covid 19 pandemic and is a racist chauvinistic pig with one of the lowest intelligence I have even seen. I have no idea how he became president let alone stayed president.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Took awhile to download it was very glitchy and I was very concerned of why I needed my phone number to login even though I just wanted to learn facts about the president..

attributes.title: delete this app
attributes.review: this app is terrible ! i was trying to download it but it took forever to download ! it also messed up my phone and made it glitch, when i tried deleting it and reinstalled it, my phone glitches worse ! there were also many racist remarks made by others on the app

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app a fat orange man came to my door and I’m a minor so I was really scared😱 he told me to leave a five star review, but he’s fat so I kicked him and he rolled down the stairs. That’s a one star for me🙄

attributes.title: My dad left because of this
attributes.review:
Well this app lead my 𝑑𝑎𝑑 to get 𝑚𝑖𝑙𝑘 🥛🥛🥛🥛at the store.  That was 3 𝑚𝑜𝑛𝑡ℎ𝑠 ago and he still hasn’t gotten back. Please I need 𝑚𝑒𝑙𝑘 to dip my 𝑜𝑟𝑒𝑜𝑠🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️ in. DONT🙅🏼🙅🙅 GET THIS APP UNLESS U WANT UR DAD 💁‍♂️💁‍♂️💁‍♂️💁‍♂️💁‍♂️TO LEAVE!!!! 
P.S 
𝐺𝐸𝑇 𝑇𝐻𝐴𝑇 𝐵𝑅𝐸𝐴𝐷 𝑇𝐻𝐴𝑇 𝐻𝐸𝐴𝐷 𝑇𝐻𝐸𝑁 𝐿𝐸𝐴𝑉𝐸 🖕✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: The worst thing possible
attributes.review: This is the most worst thing ever. I can’t believe I downloaded it. It is so bad that it’s worse than my boy cousin heart being broken.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I opened the app Nd my whole family died by the sight of a racist homophobic orange man so rip my dad oh wait I never had one of those well rip mom and btw the app has many bugs

attributes.title: Uh oh stinky
attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing I saw was trumps big stinky self. I could smell him through the screen and and I’m traumatized, will need $10,000 Worth of therapy. I hope you’re happy👎🤢

attributes.title: Unbelievable.
attributes.review: This app has had numerous problems and glitches when i am on the app and i cannot deal with this.
